meanings.definition: A word or set of words by which a person, animal, place, or thing is known, addressed, or referred to.
meanings.sent2: Please write your name on the paper.
meanings.sent3: The cat's name is Fluffy, but it acts more like a lion!
meanings.sent4: Her name was a beacon of hope in the dark night of despair.
meanings.sent5: The name 'Rose' brings to mind beauty and elegance.

meanings.definition: To give a title or designation to.
meanings.sent2: We should name this painting 'Sunset Serenity'.
meanings.sent3: I'll name you the champion of the cookie eating contest!
meanings.sent4: She named her car 'Speedy' for its quick acceleration.
meanings.sent5: Naming a star after a loved one is a special gift.

meanings.definition: To identify by name; call by a specific name.
meanings.sent1: Can you name all the countries in Europe?
meanings.sent2: I always name my plants to give them personality.
meanings.sent3: He named the stray cat 'Whiskers' because of its long whiskers.
meanings.sent4: She named her fears one by one and faced them bravely.
meanings.sent5: Naming the constellations in the night sky is a fun challenge.
